origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.get_policy_impact', 'description': 'This function analyzes the impact of financial policies on specific industries based on policy type, industry, and data needed.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial policy, e.g., green_finance, fiscal_stimulus.'}, {'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry to analyze, e.g., environmental_protection, renewable_energy.'}, {'name': 'dataNeeded', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'The types of data required for analysis, e.g., policy_files, financing_data.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact_analysis', 'description': 'The analysis of how the financial policy impacts the specified industry.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.get_policy_impact, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'green_finance', 'industry'是'environmental_protection', 'dataNeeded'是'policy_files'和'financing_data'.
